if you wanna enjoy the feeling of being a horror movie killer then dead by daylight is a game for you no matter how often you play the game is always changing becuase of the many diffrent perks for other game players and for the surviors it's very fun to play beacuse you will need to change your play style to get past the killers

Though I do recommend the game itself, the community is hella toxic, no respect whatsoever if anyone even bothers to type after a match anyways, there is nice people here and there that give gg's and well playeds but those are rare, even out of the few people that even chat post game.

Game: 9/10
Community: 1-2/10

receta de pastafrola:
125 gr manteca o margarina
125 gr azúcar
1 huevo
ralladura de 1/2 limón
esencia de vainilla
250 gr harina leudante
600 gr dulce de membrillo
Pasos
1. Cremar manteca y azúcar
2. Agregar ralladura de limón
3. El huevo y la esencia.
4. Integrar la harina leudante
5. Formar un bollo tierno sin amasar. Yo lo hago con la misma espátula. Queda una masa blanda ojo no agregar más harina
6. Envolver en film y llevar a la heladera mínimo 2 horas.
7. Espolvorear mesa y masa con harina
8.Con las 3/4 partes de masa estirar y forrar un molde de 26 o 28 cm de diámetro.
9. Poner encima el dulce de membrillo. Yo previamente a pisarlo lo pongo en el microondas 1 minuto
10. Hacer el enrejado con la masa restante. Yo estiro la masa y voy cortando las tiras con una cuchilla. Pintar con huevo batido. Ojo solo las tiras no el borde.
11. Llevar a cocinar en horno 190° durante 25 minutos aproximadamente. Depende de cada horno.

Having played both console and PC, I would recommend the PC version. Controls on this with a console are NOT ideal and even with re-keying I hit some conflicts that make it difficult to use an item or do a skill check. On PC, the only thing I needed to re-key was sprint and crouch; I have short pinkies and needed to move it up. Other than that, I enjoy this game more with friends than I do solo and we have great laughs.

A surprisingly deep pvp slasher/scooby doo simulator. Probably the most balanced asymmetrical multiplayer game out there but still wildly imbalanced in high level play. Just don't take it too seriously like way too many do, the "competitive scene" is a complete joke. Unfortunately the killers strength range from pathetic to game breakingly powerful.

Full of wacky cross overs so things like Nemesis killing Bill from L4d in Silent Hill will happen which is a cool gimmick.

This game was fun at first. As a low level killer going against low level survivors the sense of fear and danger and also fun of chasing people down/being chased was thrilling. 

Then after leveling up you realize that survivors are more interested in trolling the killer than playing the game, which becomes much worse as survivors group with real life friends and communicate with eachother. As a killer main I tried to make the game fun for everyone but it becomes discouraging when the survivors have no need to fear the killer and in order to get any points I am forced to camp people or slug them. I don't like playing that way and it's obvious that the game tends to favor the survivors since there are more of them playing.

I think a fundamental change on how this game operates would make it fun again, or a better matchmaking system, as someone casual I just can't compete with groups, but just time spent playing means I'm forced to.

Блины на молоке: традиционный рецепт

Продукты:
Молоко - 0,5 л
Яйца - 3 шт.
Масло растительное - 1 ст. ложка + для смазывания сковороды
Мука - 250 г
Сахар - 1 ст. ложка
Соль - 1 щепотка
Масло сливочное - 1 ст. ложка

шаг №1
Смешайте яйца, соль, сахар и размешайте миксером. Введите муку и влейте молоко. Взбейте блинное тесто, чтобы добиться однородной консистенции.
шаг №2
Следом отправьте в тесто растительное масло, чтобы блины в момент жарки легко переворачивались и не пригорали.
шаг №3
Разогрейте сковородку и смажьте маслом.
шаг №4
Налейте в центр сковородки небольшую порцию теста. Сразу же вращайте сковородку по кругу, чтобы тесто равномерно распределилось по всей поверхности.
шаг №5
Жарим блины на среднем огне с обеих сторон до зарумянивания. Блины очень тонкие, поэтому переворачивайте их аккуратно с помощью лопатки. После того, как блин будет готов, снимите со сковородки и смажьте сливочным маслом, чтобы края не были сухими, а блины получились нежными.
шаг №6
Блины на молоке можно подавать с вареньем, джемом или сгущенкой. Приятного аппетита!

I play this more on console than PC, however, the experience remains the same. You will experience alty survivors attempting to force you to play by their handbook. Just remember that Survivors will always use clutch perks and complain when you get a 3K/4K as killer. Of course, the game is positioned to give the killer an advantage, keep in mind that this is 4v1. The killer must do what they have to do to win. Win at all costs.
Ignore what everybody says, do you and do what makes you have a good time.

Warning: Not for the easily tilted. But for people willing to accept losses, it's a satisfying experience on both sides. Great multiplayer with friends, or just play on your own as a solo survivor or killer. Includes a number of notable characters from other franchises and has several unique and original killers with various abilities to oppress survivors. Definitely a solid game for those interested in it.

the game is quite fun and there is a lot to grind - you could play for over 1k hours and you would still be a long way off getting every survivor and killer to prestige 3. the game is more enjoyable if you buy the dlc and factor that in to the price, as this will give you access to lots of other very useful perks. (DLC perks appear in the ingame store although they are randomised weekly so if you are looking for a particular perk you could wait a very long time).

You do come across bugs but in my experience on PC it doesn't feel especially buggy - will always be complaints about hit detection and things like that which is just the nature of online gaming and each players pings

Would help if they gave just a bit more bloodpoints - during the events with offerings to boost bloodpoints it is fine (can actually hit limit quite quickly and progress fast), but outside of events it does feel very slow and too grindy to actually get levels up and unlock perks. just doubling the standard rate so the average game gives you around 50k points would be good

would recommend is a lot of fun and not too expensive (including dlc)
